event.title: passed through the district on his expedition of 1836

data.event: Thomas Mitchell passed through the district on his expedition of 1836.
Early settlers in the area were the Kirkland Brothers and a Mr. Hamilton; the latter took up Trawalla Station in 1838.

event.title: was taken over by Adolphus Goldsmith in 1841

data.event: The station was taken over by Adolphus Goldsmith in 1841 and he developed the property into a rich grazing enterprise.
Gold was discovered in 1852, with another gold rush from 1854 at nearby Fiery Creek.
